settings._mergeStrategy_comment: How to handle overlapping values: 'append' (keep all), 'replace' (last wins), 'merge' (combine terms)
settings._labelPriority_comment: Order of preference for extracting value names
settings._minimumSalience_comment: Filter out values below this salience threshold (0.0-1.0)
settings._maxCacheSize_comment: Maximum cache size in bytes (50 MB default)

domains._comment: Map custom domains to TagTeam's 5 core domains

_usage_instructions: 1. Copy this file to your project root as 'tagteam-config.json'
2. Edit the 'ontologies' array to specify your ontology sources
3. Set 'enabled: true' for ontologies you want to load
4. Choose appropriate cache strategy for your environment
5. Configure settings as needed for your use case
